column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Bakes potato was the shining star - best we've ever had. It came loaded and the bacon on it was to die for. The fires chicken was delicious and came with a side of mashed potatoes and gravy
column2: which were very good and made it an economical meal compared to the other options. The steak was perfectly cooked to order
column3: and was delicious served with Bernaise sauce and steak salt. I think it was priced about $10-15 too high for the cut
